exits.description: the forest continues to the north
the forest thins as the ground gets higher and rockier to the east
home lies outside of the woods to the west

description: the forest here is old, a good place to find dry fuel when you need it. the small beasts of the forest prefer the younger parts north of here, where the branches are less likely to break and fall under their feet.
investigationDescription: walking into the forest, you can scarcely see the sky through the treetops. birds chirp here and there.

exits.description: the forest continues to the north
the forest thins as the ground gets higher and rockier to the east
home lies outside of the woods to the west

description: the forest here is old, a good place to find dry fuel when you need it. with the sun exactly overhead, you can just make it out through the trees.
investigationDescription: you recall a time when deer roamed these forests. those days are passed. now you must hunt more dangerous prey.

the forest thins as the ground gets higher and rockier to the east
home lies outside of the woods to the west

description: the forest here is old, a good place to find dry fuel when you need it. with the sun exactly overhead, you can just make it out through the trees.
investigationDescription: the trees here are too tall for berries to grow. the younger forest to the north will be more likely to yield fruit.

exits.description: the forest continues to the north
the forest thins as the ground gets higher and rockier to the east
home lies outside of the woods to the west

description: the forest is terribly dark. you stay near the outskirts, for fear of getting lost in the blackness.
investigationDescription: you dare not go further into these old woods.

description: though no wind blows through the trees to carry the scent, you can smell the blood you drew from the bear yesterday coming from the northeast.
investigationDescription: the sound of the birds in the trees is louder today, enough to cause you discomfort. better to keep moving, better to focus on the hunt.

description: the forest here is old, a good place to find dry fuel when you need it. with the sun exactly overhead, you can just make it out through the trees.
investigationDescription: you don't have the energy to look around and carry the carcass. you should head home.

description: the old bones of the forest rattle in the wind. it seems as if the forest itself is angry.
investigationDescription: they followed the southern edge of the forest. broken twigs, disturbed brush mark the path.
